Package com.islandpower.configurator.util

Class JwtUtil

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.util.JwtUtil
@Component public class JwtUtil extends Object
Utility class for handling JWT (JSON Web Token) operations. Provides methods for generating, validating, extracting claims, and refreshing JWT tokens.

    • extractClaim

      public <T> T extractClaim(String token, Function<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims,T> claimsResolver)
      Extracts a specific claim from the JWT token using the provided claim resolver.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the claim
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token
      claimsResolver - A function to resolve the claim from the token
      Returns:
      The extracted claim

    • isTokenExpired

      public Boolean isTokenExpired(String token)
      Checks if the given JWT token has expired.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token
      Returns:
      Boolean True if the token is expired, false otherwise

      Generates a refresh token for the given user details.

      Returns:

    • validateToken

      public Boolean validateToken(String token, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Validates the given JWT token by checking the username and expiration.
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT token to validate
      userDetails - The user details to check against
      Returns:
      Boolean True if the token is valid, false otherwise

    • isTokenRefreshable

      public Boolean isTokenRefreshable(String token)
      Checks if the given JWT refresh token is refreshable (but not expired!!).
      Parameters:
      token - The JWT refresh token
      Returns:
      Boolean True if the refresh token is not expired, false otherwise

    • refreshToken

      public String refreshToken(String refreshToken)
      Refreshes the given refresh token and generates a new access token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - The JWT refresh token
      Returns:
      String the new access token
      Throws:
      TokenExpiredException - If the refresh token is expired
